description:
Takako Kamiyama has enrolled in Cromartie Girls High School, known for its princess-like young ladies-- wait, what? These boys need to be thinking about their future! It`s the end of the show, you know?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment Cromartie se transforma en lycée pour jeune filles et chacun prit de bonnes résolutions
Sudama!! Cromartie Girls High School / Fancy Club / Welcome to the Jungle / Tales of the Four Lords of Cromartie
Sudama!! Cromartie Joshi Koukou / Fancy Club / Welcome to the Jungle / Cromartie Shitennou Hen
